sources.title: Buffalo Sajadi
sources.description: Synopsis The Buffaloâ€™ narrates the story of a couple who plan to leave Iran after committing a theft. They go to the northern port city of Bandar-e Anzali to meet a man who is to smuggle them across the border. However, the meeting does not go off well. Cast: Parviz Parastooei, Soheila Golestani, Hooman Seyedi, Pantea Panahiha, Siamak Adib, Mohammad Reza Fathi
